CIPHER.235.cipherString: But computers have changed the world for everyone, so there will be some way of working it out.
CIPHER.235.question: A quote by Debbie Harry has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.235.author: Debbie Harry

CIPHER.215.cipherString: Everything is a subject on which there is not much to be said.
CIPHER.215.question: A quote by C. S. Lewis has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has WHICHT somewhere in it.
CIPHER.215.author: C. S. Lewis

CIPHER.223.cipherString: Everything came easy to me in life. I could always shake off difficulties, like water on a duck's wings.
CIPHER.223.question: Hard K2 Aristocrat with a Hint Quote Author: Rita Levi-Montalcini
CIPHER.223.author: Rita Levi-Montalcini

CIPHER.222.cipherString: One thought cannot awake without awakening others.
CIPHER.222.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Marie Ebner-Eschenbach using a Baconian cipher.  What did they say?
CIPHER.222.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

CIPHER.227.cipherString: Que pase mucho tiempo antes de que regreses al cielo, y que te muevas de un lado a otro con alegría entre tu gente.
CIPHER.227.question: A quote by Horace that has been translated to Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.227.author: Horace to Augustus
CIPHER.227.translation: May it be long before you return to the sky, and may you long move up and down gladly among your people.

CIPHER.234.cipherString: To Achieve What Nobody Else Has, You Must Do What Nobody Else Does
CIPHER.234.question: Some advice which has MUSTDO somewhere in it has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.234.author: Anonymous

CIPHER.231.cipherString: My dear doctor, I am surprised to hear you say that I am coughing very badly, as I have been practising all night.
CIPHER.231.question: A quote by John Philpot Curran has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.231.author: John Philpot Curran

CIPHER.226.question: Decode the following quote by Louise Berliawsky Nevelson which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of TOLD.
CIPHER.226.author: Louise Berliawsky Nevelson

CIPHER.214.cipherString: I am showing my pupils details of an immense landscape which they cannot possibly know their way around.
CIPHER.214.question: A quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.214.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

CIPHER.219.question: Decode the following quote by Gaelic Proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of ARTS.
CIPHER.219.author: Gaelic Proverb

CIPHER.233.cipherString: Being a leader has allowed me to showcase the power of compassion, kindness, and collective support .
CIPHER.233.question: A quote by Dorcas Affo-Toffey has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.233.author: Dorcas Affo-Toffey

CIPHER.228.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 028 85392 45167. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.216.cipherString: ewe cna egt help from teachesr, ubt ewe rae going too have to learn a lot by yourself, sittign alone inn a room.
CIPHER.216.question: A friend of yours encoded a quote by Dr. Seuss as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  Unfortunately for you they really are a bad speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.216.author: Dr. Seuss

CIPHER.217.cipherString: See the light in others and treat them as if that is all you see.
CIPHER.217.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Wayne Dyer using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.217.author: Wayne Dyer

CIPHER.221.cipherString: There is only one way to success, wealth and achievement and that is through a lot of hard work.
CIPHER.221.question: A quote by John Patrick Hickey has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.221.author: John Patrick Hickey

CIPHER.213.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 94021735 2698. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.229.cipherString: When a change occurs in Nature, the quantity of action necessary for that change is as small as possible.
CIPHER.229.question: Hard K2 Aristocrat without a Hint Quote Author: Pierre Louis Maupertuis
CIPHER.229.author: Pierre Louis Maupertuis

CIPHER.218.cipherString: It is little keys that open up big doors. On small steps leading to great achievements.
CIPHER.218.question: The following quote by Lamine Pearlheart needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MINOR and polybius key of INEXORABLY.
CIPHER.218.author: Lamine Pearlheart

CIPHER.232.cipherString: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
CIPHER.232.question: The following quote by Epictetus needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of LURES
CIPHER.232.author: Epictetus

CIPHER.224.cipherString: Dreaming is the fuel in the car of dedication!
CIPHER.224.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Todd Stocker using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DREAM
CIPHER.224.author: Todd Stocker

CIPHER.225.cipherString: Acting is also working with people who invite you into their dreams and trust you with their innermost being.
CIPHER.225.question: A quote by Catherine Deneuve has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.225.author: Catherine Deneuve

CIPHER.220.cipherString: Man little knows what calamities are beyond his patience to bear till he tries them.
CIPHER.220.question: The following quote by Oliver Goldsmith needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of BUSILY and polybius key of STUMBLING.
CIPHER.220.author: Oliver Goldsmith

CIPHER.230.cipherString: When the youth of America gets together, amazing things happen.
CIPHER.230.question: A quote by Tom Ford has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with WHENT.
CIPHER.230.author: Tom Ford
